name: Anglerfish Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a deep sea anglerfish? Well now you don't have to! Anglerfish Simulator gives you the full experience of being a deep sea predator without the pesky bone crushing pressure!

Use your arrow keys to move around the deep sea as an anglerfish. Left click to hide and attract your prey with a light in the darkness. Right click while holding left click to attack. But be careful! If you bite too quickly your food will run away... 

Collect small bacteria around the map to load your power of disguise.

Credit:

Underwater Splash 2

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=COIa1O_fJfg
